title: Ascorbic Acid Analog 6-Deoxy-6-
abstract: High-dose ascorbic acid (AA) has shown promise as an adjunctive treatment for various cancers because of its prooxidant cytotoxicity at high concentrations and its multitargeting effects. However, identifying patients who may benefit from AA treatment remains an unmet need, as the therapeutic efficacy of AA is controversial. In this study, we aimed to use an AA analog-6-deoxy-6-
